snippet: Gisele Soto, who died a month ago at the hospital, was treated as though she were emotionally disturbed rather than severely ill, relatives said.
abstract: New York City Health and Hospitals, reeling from public outrage over death of Gisele Soto due to negligent care at its Coney Island Hospital, announces three of facility's top officials will leave their posts; officials claim departures are unrelated to incident, and part of larger effort to improve patient care.
lead_paragraph: Gisele Soto, who died a month ago at the hospital, was treated as though she were emotionally disturbed rather than severely ill, relatives said.

headline.main: 3 Top Officials Leaving Coney Island Hospital After Patient’s Death
headline.print_headline: 3 Top Officials Leaving Coney Island Hospital After a Patient’s Death
